news.title: What Ads Are Political? Twitter Struggles With a Definition
news.description: After announcing that it will ban political ads on its platform, Twitter is facing challenges with regard to determining exactly how its new policy will be implemented.

news.title: Massive Facebook Document Leak Gives Ammunition to Investigators
news.description: In connection with a lawsuit by the State of California, 7,000 pages of internal Facebook documents have gone public, and may inform antitrust investigations against the company.

news.title: YouTube Launches a Redesign of Its Desktop Home Page
news.description: YouTube has unveiled a new desktop and tablet app home page design that offers users the ability to customize their home feeds.
